segments.text: What a charming room ! It faces south , and there's such a lovely view of the city .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm glad you like it.The bell is on the bedside.Just ring if you want anything.The room attendant speaks a little English.So I don't think you'll have any trouble .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I shouldn't think so.By the way , is there a socket for my razor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so.Here it is.It ' s by the basin .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good , I ' Ve get a two-pin plug .
segments.speaker: S1
